actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce for individuals the maximum rate of tax on unrecaptured section 1250 gain from 25 percent to 15 percent.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce capital gain and alternative minimum tax rates on unrecaptured Section 1250 (gain from dispositions of certain depreciable realty) gain for individual taxpayers.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to reduce for individuals the maximum rate of tax on unrecaptured section 1250 gain from 25 percent to 15 percent.
